title: Sell or trade: T206 Lattimore SGC50
author: Northviewcats

posts.post_title: Sell or trade: T206 Lattimore SGC50
posts.post_content:
Hello Everyone,

I have a T206 Lattimore, Piedmont 350, SGC50, for sale or trade. If you want to buy it is $52.00 delivered. If you want to trade I'm looking for any T206 common with the same grade that I don't already have.

Please email me if interested.

Thanks,

Joe
